name: Rogan Josh
description: A flavorful lamb curry from Kashmir, rich in spices and yogurt.

name: Makki di Roti & Sarson da Saag
description: A Punjabi winter specialty made of maize flour bread and mustard greens.

name: Masala Dosa
description: A crispy fermented rice pancake filled with spicy potato masala.

name: Hyderabadi Biryani
description: A royal rice dish from Hyderabad cooked with marinated meat and saffron.

name: Pakhala Bhata
description: A traditional Odia dish of fermented rice soaked in water, served with fried sides.

name: Macher Jhol
description: A Bengali-style fish curry with potatoes and tomatoes, seasoned with turmeric.

name: Pav Bhaji
description: A spicy mashed vegetable curry served with butter-toasted bread rolls.

name: Goan Fish Curry
description: A tangy coconut-based curry with fresh fish, typical of Goan cuisine.

name: Smoked Pork with Bamboo Shoot
description: A tribal delicacy from Nagaland cooked with smoked pork and bamboo shoots.

name: Eromba
description: A spicy Manipuri chutney made from fermented fish and boiled vegetables.
